title: GridPP4: The UK Grid for Particle Physics
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: Other disciplines have used our Grid for their own purposes. Creative Economy,Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software),Pharmaceuticals and Medical Biotechnology Societal
findingsText: We have built a Grid to analyse data from the LHC at CERN and elsewhere. This enabled the discovery of the Higgs Boson, the fundamental scalar boson that is predicted to give mass to all other particles. Other disciplines can use our facilities or work with us to develop their own. Digital/Communication/Information Technologies (including Software)
